name: grist-widget
description: A repository of grist custom widgets that have no back-end requirements.

scripts.dev:
echo 'Starting local server and watching for changes.
Start Grist with an environmental variable GRIST_WIDGET_LIST_URL=http://localhost:8585/manifest.json' && npm run watch 1> /dev/null & npm run serve:dev 1> /dev/null
scripts.test: docker image inspect gristlabs/grist --format 'gristlabs/grist image present' && NODE_PATH=_build SELENIUM_BROWSER=chrome mocha _build/test/*.js
